about.title: About Chef Calderón
about.p1: With a career that bridges continents, Chef Calderón blends Asian precision, French sophistication, and Costa Rican heart to create experiences that transcend the plate.
about.p2: His approach is guided by emotion, balance, and storytelling — every dish a dialogue between culture, memory, and craftsmanship.
about.quote: A chef’s true recipe is written in intuition, not instructions.
